
---
title: '雷神 12 代酷睿游戏本上架：i7-12700H+RTX 3050，7499 元'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/1/80ce3a6a-050e-47d0-8492-7880649aa74c.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Sun, 23 Jan 2022 11:29:10 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/1/80ce3a6a-050e-47d0-8492-7880649aa74c.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="cc2f"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 1 月 23 日消息，雷神京东游戏本旗舰店现已上架新款 911 Air 玄武游戏本，搭载了英特尔 12 代酷睿处理器和 RTX 3050 系列显卡。</p><p data-vmark="c459"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/1/80ce3a6a-050e-47d0-8492-7880649aa74c.png" w="1440" h="886" alt title="雷神 12 代酷睿游戏本上架：i7-12700H+RTX 3050，7499 元" width="1440" height="505" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="7ad6">如上图所示，雷神新款游戏本搭载了英特尔 12 代酷睿 i7-12700H 处理器，14 核 20 线程，6 性能核 + 8 能效核，最高 4.7GHz。显卡可选 RTX 3050 和 RTX 3050 Ti，搭载 DDR4 内存和 PCIe 4.0 SSD。屏幕为 15.6 英寸 1080p 144Hz。</p><p data-vmark="5cca"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/1/4e5fb894-cc80-4339-a87d-a41d4b7fca51.png" w="864" h="628" alt title="雷神 12 代酷睿游戏本上架：i7-12700H+RTX 3050，7499 元" width="864" height="596" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="b1cb">IT之家了解到，雷神新款游戏本价格已经公布，但处于无货状态，不确定是否为实际售价。</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p data-vmark="c79d">i7-12700H + RTX 3050 + 16GB + 512GB：7499 元</p></li><li><p data-vmark="0840">i7-12700H + RTX 3050 Ti + 16GB + 512GB：7899 元</p></li></ul><p data-vmark="a3a7">消息称，英特尔 12 代酷睿 H 处理器的性能将在今晚或明日凌晨解禁。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOMJK1olXgMDV1ZUDEMQBF8IGloQXw8LV1lbDUkSB19MRANLAjZbERscSkAJHTdNTwcKBlMdBgABFksWAmoKElIWWgAHVltZFxJSXzI4bQYcW1JXPB4-TjFzaDUSUggWWgZENFJROE4WCmcBHloUWTYBVllfDk8SAGg4eDx7AEVSMQMCDU4nA2o4WjUVXAMKXFdZAXsVAm4KE1wQXgUEZF5aDUgfAWkLGVkRVQ8yVFZaOBdVUS5KK2slXjYyZF5tC3tJbW5bG1sRWgMLOgQVS0xDQy5SdVkSXgEEV1tfOEkWAm0KKw" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=/pages/union/proxy/proxy?spreadUrl=https%3a%2f%2funion-click.jd.com%2fjdc%3fe%3d%26p%&EA_PTAG=17078.27.380" data-jdid="10043882674345"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/166102/1/24270/127418/61ec2ebfE200d2459/eaa3f9050f989f7b.png" title="雷神 12 代酷睿游戏本上架：i7-12700H+RTX
